subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Now that tense negotiations with the Boston Red Sox have ended for Japanese ace Daisuke Matsuzaka, agent Scott Boras can concentrate on making pitcher Barry Zito the next $100 million man in baseball.
snippet: Now that tense negotiations with the Boston Red Sox have ended for Japanese ace Daisuke Matsuzaka, agent Scott Boras can concentrate on making pitcher Barry Zito the next $100 million man in baseball.
